Proximity_Encryption_Suite

Class Login_Account_Recover_Password

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • Proximity_Encryption_Suite.Login_Account_Recover_Password
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Login_Account_Recover_Password
extends java.awt.Dialog
    The Login_Account_Recover_Password.Java Class implements an application that allows a users chose the new password for their account so why can be given access to the Proximity Encryption Suite.
    Since:
    18-01-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harry Clewlow (C012952A)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
